MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 19-DEC-2020 20:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL22 postcode area of Abergele, affecting properties in Llanddulas and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of on site difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:46PM on 19th December 2020.
